txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'We are in the midst of repairing the Hadhodiant in the Vales of Anduin. Our Beorning allies have sent word that a band of drakes heads south towards the bridge!

'We must protect the bridge builders and the work they have accomplished on the Hadhodiant!'
Your mission is to defend the bridge builders of the Hadhodiant.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to the Hadhodiant.
Monsters in this mission will enrage at low morale, gaining attack strength and attack speed.
You have been tasked with defending the bridge builders of the Hadhodiant from a potential ambush.
Complete Mission: Aiding the Bridge Builders
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to the Hadhodiant. We must finish repairing the bridge!'

'Well done! I thank you for halting the attack and saving the bridge builders! Now we will finish repairing the Hadhodiant so that trade and movement will be swifter between the Vales of Anduin and the Misty Mountains!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
An ambush could threathen the bridge builders, who work to repair to the Hadhodiantâ€¦.\n\nYour mission is to defend the bridge builders of the Hadhodiant.
